mapper.sql: id, user_name, password, shop_no, shop_name, gmt_create, gmt_modify
mapper.delete: update user set row_status=-1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, user_name, password, shop_no, shop_name gmt_create, gmt_modify, row_status, row_version) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rowStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{rowVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT})
